EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE - OCTOBER 28-29, 2013: TriTech Fall 2013 Training Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> SAVE THE DATE: PTI Fall 2013 Training Summit October 28 - 29, 2013 l Westborough, MA A regional, multi-department training event with continuing
education and networking. Last year’s event sold out quickly
and space is limited. Training Details REGISTRATION OPENS NEXT MONTH! Dates: October 28 - 29, 2013
Cost: $275.00 (Early-bird discount before 9/30/13) $325.00 after 9/30/13 Or, buy three (3) and get the fourth (4) registration FREE! Fee includes two full days of training, breakfast, lunch, and an afternoon snack each day
Questions? David Bourbonniere | 978-215-2301 David.Bourbonniere@tritech.com <mailto:David.Bourbonniere@tritech.com>
